'''What Do You Mean, You Hid Them?''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to dig up all four of [[Juliano]]'s treasure chests in [[Petrichor]].

==Locations==
The four dig spots can be found:
* Next to the eastern [[Waverider Waypoint]].
*: <gallery>
Petrichor Juliano Chest Location 1.png|Location
Petrichor Juliano Chest Location Context 1.png|Additional context
</gallery>
* North of [[Faded Theater]], next to a washed-up boat.
*: <gallery>
Petrichor Juliano Chest Location 2.png|Location
Petrichor Juliano Chest Location Context 2.png|Additional context
</gallery>
* Behind a building at the center of Petrichor, along a patch of [[Mint]]s.
*: <gallery>
Petrichor Juliano Chest Location 3.png|Location
Petrichor Juliano Chest Location Context 3.png|Additional context
</gallery>
* Near the pool leading to [[Faded Castle]], by a lone [[Marcotte]] flower.
*: <gallery>
Petrichor Juliano Chest Location 4.png|Location
Petrichor Juliano Chest Location Context 4.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Gameplay Notes==
* All chests leave behind a note hinting at the whereabouts of the other chests:
{{Dialogue Start}}
:{{Readable|title=Ancient Piece of Paper|text=<!--
-->Standing at the corner's apex,<br><!--
-->Gazing at the distant island of flowing pearls,<br><!--
-->Facing the heart of the mountains,<br><!--
-->Seeking the eye of the springs.<br><!--
--><br><!--
-->Juliano, an ordinary villager
}}
{{Dialogue End}}
